EmailTemplate.name: AE Targeted Lead Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi -
This is {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} from WEX, your fleet fuel card provider. Thank you for your business. You may have seen an email from us recently, and I wanted to let you know I'll be reaching out you to follow up in the near future.
Best Regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} Account Executive WEX Inc. 123 Darling Avenue, So. Portland, ME 04106 Office {!User.Phone} www.wexinc.com
